title: Question about using the League of Legends logo on a posterboard.
body:
Hey, guys. 

I just wanted to ask a question about using the LoL logo on a college presentation.
I wish to avoid any copyright complications because I also wish to give credit where credit is due. So, my question is..

_**Who do I have to get into contact with to have permission just to print a picture of the logo and paste it on my posterboard? If I need to.**_

Thanks and have a nice day,
_T_.   {{summoner:11}}

replies.body:
Hey Tulrish, 

There shouldn't be any issue with you using the LoL logo on your College project. Unless your selling your College project for millions of dollars...>.> Then you should be fine. If you get worried you can read Riots Legal Jibber Jabber and read up on it: http://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber

...Sincerely That Person walking by awkwardly 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}

Yo, Gold. Thanks for the response!

glhf on the rift, buddy.
